author: Special Correspondent
text:
Disappointed customers looking at a banner in front of a public sector bank in Thanjavur on Friday when a section of the bank employees went on a day's strike.— PHOTO: R.M. RAJARATHINAM

Public and traders suffered had to endure some shortcomings as transactions were hit on Friday with sections of bank staff going on a nationwide strike to press their charter of demands.

Alleging that some banks had not implemented the scope of revised service conditions, including salary and perks, various bank officials’ associations had given call for a strike. Banking operations were partially affected although the banks recorded some significant employee attendance.

Traders and commercial complaints had to bear with three consecutive bank holidays with the financial institutions remaining closed on Saturday and Sunday for an extended weekend.
title: Bank strike hits traders
